Connect-AzAccount: Connect to Azure with an authenticated account for use with cmdlets from the Az PowerShell modules.
Disconnect-AzAccount: Disconnects a logged-in account and removes all credential and context information associated with that account.
Get-AzContext: Gets the metadata used to authenticate Azure Resource Manager requests.
Set-AzContext: Sets the tenant, subscription, and environment for cmdlets to use in the current session.
Get-AzSubscription: Gets subscription ID, subscription name, and home tenant for subscriptions that the current account can access.
New-AzVM: Creates a new virtual machine in Azure.
Get-AzVM: Gets the properties of a virtual machine.
Remove-AzVM: Removes a virtual machine from Azure.
Update-AzVM: Updates the state of an Azure virtual machine.
Get-AzVirtualNetwork: Gets a virtual network in a resource group.
Get-AzPublicIpAddress: Gets a public IP address resource.
